 
Navodith is given a string S and he wants to rearrange the alphabets of S in a particular manner to make another string W such that all lexicographically string higher than S is made and Navodith will select the lexicographically smallest from all.
If no answer exist print "no answer" without quotes.

Input
The first line of input contains T, the number of test cases. Each of the next T lines contains string S
 

Output
For each testcase, output a string and if no answer exists, print "no answer" without quotes.
 

Constraints

1 ≤ T ≤ 100000
1 ≤ |S| ≤ 100

 

Example
Input:
2
bb
abc

Output:
no answer
acb
